price: Ҳали куфр келтирганлар мусулмон бўлишни ҳам истаб қолурлар.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
